Description: Steinberger Spirit GT-PRO W/ Roland GK-2A Midi Pickup & Case No Magnetic Pickups **This guitar has been modified, sold as is** Pick ups have been removed and cavity has been covered with a custom pick guard which has been attached with an adhesive tape. instead of a conventional pick up the Roland GK-2A has been attached. (NO 13 pin cable is included) all control (volume, tone, five way switch) are intact and in the control cavity of guitar with the leads to the pick ups snipped one strap button has been removed but is included. Ready to go as a synth guitar or have some new pups installed!
